about_the_game:
Gain access to the main character's unique diary.

Photos, descriptions, and sketches of the sexual partners Vydija Lee met this year.

By purchasing this add-on, you support the production and development of our game.

As announced, we would like to continue updating Nymphomaniac, adding new scenes, new partners, and adventures of our heroine to the game.

As you know, we have been updating the game for free from the beginning.

If you want us to continue expanding the game with new content, we encourage you to support us by purchasing this add-on.

All money collected through this DLC will be used directly to support the game.

You can buy this supplement multiple times, in any quantities.

Thank you!

content_descriptors.notes: The package contains photos (renders) of the main character's sexual partners, and detailed descriptions of their meetings, written in the form of a diary.

name: Nymphomaniac - Vydija Lee Support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050, RX 460 (or equivalent with at least 4GB of memory)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
